backend/main.mo: Defines core actor with user, job, application, chat, rating, and notification types and storage plus login and access control setup.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence linking UI changes to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing, authentication flow, profile setup handling, and portal selection based on user type.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Candid: Candidate profile view/edit screen supporting department selection, CV upload, and profile updates.
frontend/src/components/candidate/ChatTa: Messaging interface that lists conversation partners, displays chat history, and sends new messages.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Employ: Placeholder employer directory card indicating the feature is coming soon.
frontend/src/components/candidate/JobSea: Job search UI with filtering, job details display, and application submission via dialog.
frontend/src/components/employer/Candida: Employer tool to search candidates by department and location and display result cards.
frontend/src/components/employer/Employe: Renders employer chat UI, listing conversation partners, showing messages, and allowing sending new messages via hooks.
Displays and edits employer profile fields, loading data from hooks and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/employer/JobMana: Manages employer job postings including creation, editing, deletion, and viewing applications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with branding, smooth-scroll quick links, contact details, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, navigation, smooth scrolling, and authenticated user menu without a login button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating either candidate or employer profiles, handling form inputs, CV upload, and registration calls.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Floating WhatsApp button that appears after a delay and opens a predefined chat link.
frontend/src/constants/contact.ts: Exports a constant containing phone, WhatsApp, email, and location contact info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, stored identity loading, and context state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for login, profiles, jobs, applications, chat messages, and other backend interactions using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme variables for light and dark modes, and custom styles including a WhatsApp floating button with animations and responsive behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPortal.tsx: Admin dashboard displaying analytics, candidate/employer/job tables, and deletion/export tools with authentication and admin checks.
frontend/src/pages/CandidatePortal.tsx: Tabbed candidate portal for job search, employer browsing, chat, and profile management.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerPortal.tsx: Tabbed employer portal for job management, candidate search, chat, and profile settings.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page listing services for different user groups with login and onboarding actions.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data collection, usage, and security practices.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: React page rendering the Terms of Service with sections on accounts, acceptable use, and job features using card components and styling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file listing schema info, existing features, pending feature requests, and meta details for build planning.
